title: Sony Xperia 10 VI receiving Android 15 update
description: The Xperia 10 VI is the latest Sony device to get updated to Android 15. This is the first major Android update for the device which launched with Android 14 and is promised to receive three Android version updates in its life cycle. The new update comes three weeks after the Xperia 10 V began receiving the latest version of Android. Sony Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update screen (in Dutch) Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update features the 70.1.A.0.425 build number and is reportedly under 1GB in size. As usual, there’s no update changelog but we presume the features will be similar to...
excerpt: This is the first major Android update for the device. The Xperia 10 VI is the latest Sony device to get updated to Android 15. This is the first major...
text: The Xperia 10 VI is the latest Sony device to get updated to Android 15. This is the first major Android update for the device which launched with Android 14 and is promised to receive three Android version updates in its life cycle. The new update comes three weeks after the Xperia 10 V began receiving the latest version of Android. Sony Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update screen (in Dutch) Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update features the 70.1.A.0.425 build number and is reportedly under 1GB in size. As usual, there’s no update changelog but we presume the features will be similar to other Sony Xperia that previously got updated to Android 15. Expect Private space, new wallpapers, new home screen/lock screen styles, new Side Sense features, a redesigned quick settings panel and notification shade, new pop-up windows, and Bluetooth broadcasting over Bluetooth LE Audio, among others. Via
html:
The Xperia 10 VI is the latest Sony device to get updated to Android 15. This is the first major Android update for the device which launched with Android 14 and is promised to receive three Android version updates in its life cycle. The new update comes three weeks after the Xperia 10 V began receiving the latest version of Android.


Sony Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update screen (in Dutch)

Xperia 10 VI's Android 15 update features the 70.1.A.0.425 build number and is reportedly under 1GB in size. As usual, there’s no update changelog but we presume the features will be similar to other Sony Xperia that previously got updated to Android 15.

Expect Private space, new wallpapers, new home screen/lock screen styles, new Side Sense features, a redesigned quick settings panel and notification shade, new pop-up windows, and Bluetooth broadcasting over Bluetooth LE Audio, among others.

Via
